actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument in the State of Idaho.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument in the State of Idaho. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument in the State of Idaho.
